May be accepted as hand carry baggage, subject to the destination’s quarantine regulations. Items are to be properly packed and meet the cabin baggage policy. If dry ice is used in the packaging of these items, a maximum of 2.5 kg of dry ice per guest is permissible in the cabin. Acceptance of such items is at our discretion and we reserve the right to refuse carriage. Musical Instruments Safe

urls.title: All you need to know about our cabin baggage policy
urls.description: This policy will be reinstated effective from 7 July 2020. You are allowed to bring onboard two (2) pieces of bag as part of your cabin baggage allowance with the total weight of both items not exceeding 7kg. O ne (1) piece of cabin bag must not exceed 56cm x 36cm x 23cm including the handles, wheels and side pockets. This bag must be able to fit in the overhead compartment in the aircraft cabin. You may also carry one (1) piece of laptop bag, handbag, backpack or any other small bag which must not

urls.title: Things you need to know about our checked baggage policy.
urls.description: Weight & dimension limit for each bag. You can bring as many bags as you wish as long as it is within your purchased or complimentary checked baggage allowance. However if you have purchased more than 30 kg of baggage allowance, please note that each bag you will be checking-in must follow the following requirements; For flights from /to the United States, the baggage allowance is based on the per-piece concept. You can purchase a maximum of two (2) pieces and each piece must not weigh more than 20kg. If

urls.title: Travelling with fresh, frozen, oversized, or fragile goods.
urls.description: Fresh or frozen seafood. Safe as Checked Baggage? Safe as Cabin Baggage? Cannot be accepted as checked baggage. May be accepted as hand carry baggage, subject to the destination’s quarantine regulations. Items are to be properly packed and meet the cabin baggage policy. If dry ice is used in the packaging of these items, a maximum of 2.5 kg of dry ice per guest is permissible in the cabin. Acceptance of such items is at our discretion and we reserve the right to refuse carriage. Musical Instruments Safe

urls.title: All you need to know about Credit Account
urls.description: What is a Credit Account? The amount spent on your flight booking will be reimbursed to you as a Credit Account for you to make future bookings with AirAsia-operated flights. It will be available in your airasia rewards member account under the “Credit Account” option in the same currency which was used to pay for your flight booking. Once you have logged in to your airasia rewards member account on airasia.com or the airasia Super App, select “Credit Account” from the menu and you will be able to see
